title: The Fast and the Furious : domestic and global box office revenue 2019
summary: The statistic presents the office revenue 2019 of Furious_7 movie franchise in North America and Worldwide .

As of 2018 , `` Furious_7 and the Fast_&_Furious_6 '' , the second installment in the domestic based on the books written by J.K. Rowling , reached a gross of 238.68 million U.S. dollars in 4,455 cinemas across North America .

data.Movie: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift

gold: As of September 2019 , 'Furious 7 ' _ , the seventh installment in the series , reached a gross of 353.01 million U.S. dollars in cinemas across North America.
The film had the highest grossing opening weekend of all of the films in the franchise , bringing in a box office gross of 147.2 million U.S. dollars when it was released in April 2015 .
